tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_tools (
    tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tool_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    researcher_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE research_workflows (
	workflow_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	workflow_name VARCHAR(100),
	workflow_description TEXT,
	workflow_tool_id UUID,
	FOREIGN KEY (workflow_tool_id) REFERENCES software_tools (tool_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
 researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 researcher_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 institution VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE software_tools (
 tool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tool_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE simulation_workflows (
 workflow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 workflow_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 researcher_id INT REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tool_workflow_mapping (
 mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tool_id INT REFERENCES software_tools(tool_id),
 workflow_id INT REFERENCES simulation_workflows(workflow_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tool_versions (
 version_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tool_id INT REFERENCES software_tools(tool_id),
 version_number VARCHAR(20)
)
